archimate:Goal.name: Significant product and service speed uplift
archimate:Goal.documentation: AI, RPA, and other processes automation is a huge part of the success of our business. We already have teams built under Yevgen Chernousovâ€™s leadership to support these initiatives. However, for your success at INFUSE, we expect all departmental and Team Leads to move FAST using the best of all these tools. Starting in February 2024 through last week, we had 309 Return Cases with a total 1,528 of returned leads resulting from our operations and product quality issues
